scenario.name: simple IMS session setup, server-side
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_Record-Route:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:bob@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE,REGISTER,ACK,BYE,INFO,REFER,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,MESSAGE,CANCEL Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 53655765 2353687637 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 40000 RTP/AVP 8 0 18 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000
